body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install ant
... 
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 1:
    '/bin/bash' './build.sh' 'install'

2 errors found in build log:
     273    check_for_optional_packages:
     274    
     275    build:
     276    Created dir: /tmp/mdorier/spack-stage/spack-stage-kKPlsZ/apache-ant-1.9.9/build/lib
     277    Compiling 269 source files to /tmp/mdorier/spack-stage/spack-stage-kKPlsZ/apache-ant-1.9.9/build/classes
     278    warning: [options] bootstrap class path not set in conjunction with -source 5
  >> 279    error: Source option 5 is no longer supported. Use 6 or later.
  >> 280    error: Target option 1.5 is no longer supported. Use 1.6 or later.
```

### Platform and user environment

Please report your OS here:
```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux graphene-79.nancy.grid5000.fr 4.9.0-8-amd64 #1 SMP Debian 4.9.110-3+deb9u4 (2018-08-21) x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ spack spec -I ant
Input spec
--------------------------------
     ant

Concretized
--------------------------------
     ant@1.9.9%gcc@6.3.0 arch=linux-debian9-x86_64 
[+]      ^jdk@10.0.2_13%gcc@6.3.0 arch=linux-debian9-x86_64
```
title: Installation issue: ant
